about_the_game:
Bring a touch of luxury to the board with the Imperial chess set for Chess Ultra.

Hand crafted and embellished with jewels fit for a King, the Imperial pack contains two exclusive chessmen designs. The Ruby and Emerald set radiates elegance with polished gold adorned with the finest gemstones, whilst the Platinum and Onyx set provides a striking contrast with stylish gunmetal pieces and elegant stones to match.
Make a statement with this exquisite chess set for Chess Ultra.

This pack contains a chess set only, which can be used in any environment in the game.

Make a statement with this exquisite chess set for Chess Ultra.

This pack contains a chess set only, which can be used in any environment in the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450 or AMD Radeon HD 6750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This will ensure the game will run at 1080p at 30fps. These specifications do not reflect VR, see Recommended Requirements for more details
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gerforce GTX 780 or 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This will ensure the game will run at 1080p at 60fps. These specifications do not reflect VR, an NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1070/1080 or AMD equivalent will be required to experience 90 FPS on a HTC VIVE or OCULUS RIFT

short_description: Bring a touch of luxury to the board with the Imperial chess set for Chess Ultra. Hand crafted and embellished with jewels fit for a King, the Imperial pack contains two exclusive chessmen designs.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Russian, Portuguese - Brazil
